Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: I'll start by going through each event one by one and see if I can spot any patterns or connections. I'll note down the key details for each event, especially focusing on patient age and gender because those can help distinguish between different patients.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Event 1: Register patient in ER, male, 45 years old, private insurance. Event 2: Register patient in ER, female, 62 years old, public insurance. Event 3: Register patient in Surgery, male, 28 years old, private insurance.
